item.description:
Friday, March 9, 2012, 8:00 PM

Zen Bar

317 Farmington Avenue, Plainville, CT 

So many of you are asking about having a Karaoke Night again. So, we are going back to where it all started. Those who attended this venue had a great time! And why not? Year after year, Zen Bar has been voted top 3 in the Hartford Advocate's Reader's Poll for Best in Karaoke in all of Connecticut. Zen Bar is not just an amazing venue for entertainment, but they're food menu is fantastic!. Also, Zen Bar serves up over 200 martinis and many other specialty drinks and we have over 65 varieties of beers for you to choose from.

So join us for songs, eats, drinks and fun!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Rose...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Back Where It All Started ... Karaoke @ ZEN BAR!
